column1: Little Goat Diner////Confession: I'm a big fan of all things Steph Izzard and Alex Bachman
column2: but that's only because they nail it EVERY time. Little Goat is no exception. We'd been trying to get here for a long time and the right time presented itself today... FINALLY. She set out to bring her take on a diner and she nailed it. The menu is bigger than her menus usually are (typical for diners)
column3: has typical diner fare done remarkably well (including milkshakes and sandwiches)
column4: and is the right price point for the food and neighborhood. We got the bread of the day to start which was spot-on. Then I had the killer tuna melt... so very nom nom nom. We also got the mac n cheese which was a great side to share for 3-4 people.
